code: import React from'react';import{Redirect}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/App.css';import LucasFace from"../assets/Lucas Pao Berklee.jpg";class Homepage extends React.Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.state={redirectLink:"/"};}handleClick(page){const link=this.state.redirectLink.concat(page);this.setState({redirectLink:link});}render(){if(this.state.redirectLink!=="/"){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Redirect,{to:this.state.redirectLink});}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"homeLayout"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",null,"Lucas Pao"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",{style:{margin:"0"}},"Software Engineer."),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",{style:{margin:"0"}},"Full-Stack Developer."),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",{style:{margin:"0"}},"Mobile App Developer."),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("br",null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{onClick:()=>this.handleClick("projects")},"Projects"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{onClick:()=>this.handleClick("experience")},"Experience")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{padding:"10%"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:LucasFace,style:{width:"100%",height:"auto",borderRadius:"150px"},alt:"Portrait of Lucas' face."})));}}export default Homepage;
